curiosity-auth.maintenanceCopy: We are currently undergoing scheduled maintenance and will be back shortly. Thank you for your patience.

curiosity-banner.dataMismatchMessage: There might be inconsistencies between data in the graph and your current systems table. The issue is currently being resolved.
curiosity-banner.dataMismatchMessage_cloudigradeMismatch: <0>View recommended actions</0> to take in order to improve {{appName}} reporting.

curiosity-graph.socketsLegendTooltip: {{product}} CPU usage, per CPU socket pair.
curiosity-graph.cloudSocketsLegendTooltip: Public cloud {{product}} CPU usage, 1 CPU socket per instance.
curiosity-graph.hypervisorSocketsLegendTooltip: {{product}} CPU socket usage, per socket pair.
curiosity-graph.hypervisorSocketsLegendTooltip_RHEL: Virtualized {{product}} CPU usage, per socket. Hypervisor guest usage with known host-guest mappings (such as multi-guest VDC subscriptions), per socket pair of the hypervisor host, using the same method as physical {{product}}.
curiosity-graph.physicalSocketsLegendTooltip: {{product}} CPU socket usage, per socket pair.
curiosity-graph.physicalSocketsLegendTooltip_RHEL: Physical {{product}} CPU usage, per socket pair. Each system's socket count is rounded upwards to the next even number.
curiosity-graph.thresholdLegendTooltip: Maximum capacity, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.thresholdLegendTooltip_RHEL: Maximum capacity, as CPU sockets, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.thresholdCoresLegendTooltip_OpenShift: Maximum capacity, as CPU cores, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.thresholdSocketsLegendTooltip_OpenShift: Maximum capacity, as CPU sockets, based on total {{product}} subscriptions in this account.
curiosity-graph.tooltipSummary: Your subscription data facets. With one level of column and row headers.

curiosity-inventory.tableSummary: A generated table with one level of column headers.
curiosity-inventory.tableEmptyInventoryMessage: No results match the filter criteria. Remove filters or clear all filters to show results.

curiosity-optin.cardDescription: {{appName}} unlocks a single-pane view into your total subscription package, from usage to capacity, across your hybrid infrastructure over time.
curiosity-optin.cardSeeTitle: Know your account-wide usage at a glance
curiosity-optin.cardSeeDescription: See unified reporting of subscription usage information across your physical, virtual, on-premise, and cloud infrastructure.
curiosity-optin.cardReportDescription: Enhance your ability to consume, track, report, and reconcile your Red Hat subscriptions.
curiosity-optin.cardFilterDescription: View your inventory by critical indicators like Service Level Agreement (SLA) and architecture.
curiosity-optin.cardIsActiveDescription: Data can take up to 24 hours to be processed and will appear on this page when ready.
curiosity-optin.cardIsErrorDescription: An activation error has occurred. <0>Contact us</0> for more information.
curiosity-optin.notificationsSuccessDescription: It could take up to 24 hours for data to appear.
curiosity-optin.tourTitleImageAlt: Ready to get started example graph.
curiosity-optin.tourDescription: We'll walk you through each step, and include insight into how Red Hat collects and uses subscription data.

curiosity-view.title: {{appName}}
curiosity-view.subtitle: Monitor your usage based on your subscription terms. <0>Learn more about {{appName}} reporting</0>
curiosity-view.subtitle_OpenShift: Monitor your Red Hat OpenShift usage by socket or core usage, based on your subscription terms. <0>Learn more about {{appName}} reporting</0>
curiosity-view.subtitle_RHEL: Monitor your Red Hat Enterprise Linux usage by physical, virtual, and public cloud sockets. <0>Learn more about {{appName}} reporting</0>
